Address.value: 851 BROKEN SOUND PARKWAY, NW,SUITE 215, BOCA RATON, Florida, 33487, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sensus Healthcare Inc is engaged in manufacturing a superficial radiotherapy system. These devices are used for treating skin cancers including basal cell and squamous cell skin cancers and other skin conditions such as keloids. Its product includes SRT-100, SRT-100 vision, and a sentinel service program. The company's revenue is generated primarily from customers in the United States.
